meanings.definition: A person who arranges or plans events or activities.
meanings.sent1: The school organizer coordinated the field trip for the students.
meanings.sent2: The event organizer ensured everything ran smoothly at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The organizer joked that planning the party was like herding cats.
meanings.sent4: She was the organizer of the family reunion, bringing everyone together.
meanings.sent5: The organizer's attention to detail made the conference unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to keep items in order.
meanings.sent1: I used the drawer organizer to sort my socks and underwear.
meanings.sent2: The closet organizer helped me neatly store my clothes.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen organizer kept the spices neatly arranged in a row.
meanings.sent4: The desk organizer kept all my pens and pencils in one place.
meanings.sent5: The car trunk organizer made packing for the trip much easier.

meanings.definition: A software program or application used to manage information or tasks.
meanings.sent1: I rely on the digital organizer to keep track of my appointments.
meanings.sent2: The online organizer helps me stay organized with my to-do lists.
meanings.sent3: The virtual organizer reminded me of my upcoming deadlines.
meanings.sent4: The electronic organizer syncs all my devices for easy access.
meanings.sent5: The mobile organizer keeps all my contacts in one place.
